General.Name: Kaiser China Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Kaiser (China) Culture Co., Ltd operates in the Internet entertainment industry. The company is involved in the intellectual property operations; and research, development, and distribution of mobile games. It also produces and invests in films and television dramas, as well as animations; and invests in Internet culture industry. The company was formerly known as Kaiser (China) Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kaiser (China) Culture Co., Ltd in September 2016. Kaiser (China) Culture Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

4.Name: Ms. Ling  Peng
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
